fullName: Checkout process: Complete the checkout process

description:
As a user
    I want to complete the checkout process
    So that I can purchase the product(s)

steps.name: Given  the user is logged in and on products page
When  the user adds the Sauce Labs Backpack to cart
And  the user clicks on the shopping cart icon
And  the user clicks on the checkout button
And  the user enters "<firstName>" as first name, "<lastName>" as last name, and "<postalCode>" as zip/postal code

steps.name: And  the user clicks on the continue button
And  the user clicks on the finish button
Then  the checkout process should be completed successfully
